version_description:
* Purchase ManyCam Pro to unlock all features & sources
* Record while you stream
* Fixed orientation/rotation and other bugs
* Streaming to ManyCam is improved

* Added ability to mute microphone.
* Sound from the main source is now mixed with microphone sound.
* Camera zoom on pinch ( Both front/back if supported by device )
* Allow your friends to connect you via device sharing ( On the site. )
* Snapshots shutter sound
* Added flash while using back camera.

* Added ability to mute microphone.
* Sound from the main source is now mixed with microphone sound.
* Camera zoom on pinch ( Both front/back if supported by device )
* Allow your friends to connect you via device sharing ( On the site. )
* Snapshots shutter sound
* Added flash while using back camera.

+ Hotfix: Fixed crash on restore from background mode.

* 20 new awesome video filters
* Noise suppression (mic input)
* Disable confirmation for incoming connection (new settings option)
* Local video source: "Autoplay on Switch" and "Loop" settings options
* Set RTMP (YouTube, FaceBook) video bitrate (even while you stream)
* Streaming to ManyCam: improved audio & video sync (upcoming on desktop)
* Bug fixing and performance optimization

* Sound quality improvements
* RTMP streaming supports authorization for custom servers
* Fixed a bug when some IP Cameras are disconnected after 60 seconds
* Bug fixing

* Improved Facebook integration. (Updated Facebook SDK to latest version.)
* Crash fixes

* Sound quality improvements
* RTMP streaming supports authorization for custom servers
* Fixed a bug when some IP Cameras are disconnected after 60 seconds
* Bug fixing
+ Crash fixing

* Added social login.(Facebook, Google and Twitter)
* Added 1080p output resolution.
* Various bug fixes and improvements.
* Multiple crash fixes and overall optimizations.

* Improved Facebook integration. (Updated Facebook SDK to latest version.)
* Crash fixes

Brand feature Picture-in-Picture feature!
- We've added the first version of Picture in Picture so now you can overlay yourself over your videos while broadcasting.
-- In addition to PiP, coming soon will be video calls and invite a friend to your broadcast.

Bug fixes:
- Fixed video orientation for local video sources in portrait mode.
- Multiple crash fixes.
- Social media login fixes.
- Overall optimizations.
- Various bug fixes and improvements.

- Added support for RTMPs.
- Improved communication with desktop application.
- Various bug fixes and improvements.
- Resolved a crash for users using an iOS version lower than iOs v10.

* Video calls feature (mobile-to-mobile only)
* The app was rewritten to use Metal 2 API
* Improved audio/video sync for streaming to desktop
* Increased performance.
* Other bug fixes and stability improvements

* Video calls feature (mobile-to-mobile only)
* The app was rewritten to use Metal 2 API
* Improved audio/video sync for streaming to desktop
* Increased performance.
* Other bug fixes and stability improvements

- Added localization for 7 languages ( English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Dutch, Portuguese, Russian, Chinese Simplified, Chinese Traditional )
- Changes, bug fixes for effects.
- General bug fixes and improvements.

- Brand new, re-worked UI that is much easier to use.
- Added login with Apple ID.
- Added NDI Output, you can now use the ManyCam mobile app as an NDI video source in the ManyCam desktop application, or any other application that supports NDI input.
- Performance optimizations.
- Bug fixes and improvements.

- New broadcast panel UI.
- Moved to new YouTube streaming API.
- Bug fixes and improvements.

- Added new ManyCam Guests feature to Alpha testing, allowing you to communicate with other ManyCam users in the test and to add them as guests to your broadcasts.
-- To test ManyCam Guests, download the ManyCam Guests Alpha build from the forums @ https://forum.manycam.com/
- Various bug fixes.
